creator: dalgoda@ix.netcom.com
text:
I use a build system that has a minimal PATH, including no ant or java in it. 
Instead, I call ant directly and it uses JAVA_HOME to properly find java.

In this situation, <javacc/> fails:
file:/opt/main/NodeWarrior/bin/build_NWServer.xml:56: Could not launch java:
java.io.IOException: java.io.IOException: java: not found

Seems silly to have to set both JAVA_HOME and PATH in order to get this to work
properly, but the following is a work around:

PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin /path/to/ant -f /path/to/build.xml
